meanings.definition: To bend or stretch (a part of the body) in order to show off muscles.
meanings.sent1: He was flexing his arms to impress his friends.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys flexing her muscles after a workout.
meanings.sent3: The bodybuilder was flexing his muscles in the mirror, admiring his hard work.
meanings.sent4: The wrestler was flexing his muscles before the match, intimidating his opponent.
meanings.sent5: Flexing his muscles, he felt a sense of accomplishment and strength.

meanings.definition: To show off or boast about one's possessions or achievements.
meanings.sent1: She was flexing her new car to everyone in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: He keeps flexing his expensive watch in front of his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The millionaire was flexing his wealth by buying extravagant gifts for his friends.
meanings.sent4: She was flexing her academic achievements during the interview.
meanings.sent5: Flexing his success, he shared stories of his accomplishments with pride.

meanings.sent1: The lion was flexing its muscles before pouncing on its prey.
meanings.sent2: The superhero was flexing his superpowers to save the city.
meanings.sent3: The robot was flexing its mechanical arms, ready for action.
meanings.sent4: The army general was flexing his authority during the meeting.
meanings.sent5: Flexing their might, the team won the championship with ease.
